website_summaries.verdict: A dual hot/cold electric lunch bag with greater organization on the inside than other options.
pros: Dual compartment design allows you to keep food hot and drinks cold in a single bag
Soft bag construction is extremely durable and convenient to carry around
Comes with bonus hot packs and cold packs
cons: Heating packs require the use of a microwave or similar heat source to get up to the right temperature

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as it appears
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself seems pretty nice and well made it’s just too small.. over all it appears it would be a large bag from the outside. The downfall is finding a container that even fits in it and once you add in the ice packs or heat packs there’s even less room. We use basic food prep contains and they do not fit what so ever even without the packs. Great concept just would’ve been so much better if it actually accommodated containers or came with containers that fit. Really disappointed this wasn’t what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love this lunch bag cooler - much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch bag cooler - much better than expected. I don't use it regularly, just for long business trips. I prefer to take home cooked food with me due to dietary limitations - and this bag really keeps my food warm with the 2 red heat packs. Having an excellent cooler for cold drinks is a bonus. It is a large lunch box, though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My father was looking was looking for this exact type of cooler since he had something similar for many years. Could not find in any local stores. I ordered it for him on Amazon and he is completely satisfied with everything about it. He loves the color and durability. He is completely satisfied that it is exactly as advertised and says he would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It holds everything I need it to hold without a problem, The biggest drawback for me is fighting with the zippers to open or close the top of the bag. It is a huge pain in the rear doing so. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bfek.

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but bad bag
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected the bag was looking rough when I took it out the box and the zippers do not close right I’m scared it won’t last long so I’m debating on sending back...
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag hot and cold storage works well
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag hot and cold storage works well. Hot side doesn’t keep food hot for too long maybe 3hours total but it does keep hot food warm for about 4-5 hours all depends how much and what type of things you want to keep hot or warm. For the price it’s worth it and it’s hard to find another item like it. I could not find anything close to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size lunch bag - big enough, but not too big!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for - something to keep the stew warm and the beer cold. This is large enough to carry what I need going on day trips, but not cumbersome at all, especially with the adjustable strap. Very sturdy material - I can tell I'll get a lot of use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the concept, just wish the two compartments could hold longer containers.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Philpotts

customer_reviews.title: and the fact that his lunch stays warm while his drinks stay cool!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lunch bag for my husband who travels for work. He loves the bag, and the fact that his lunch stays warm while his drinks stay cool!
customer_reviews.author: Alannah

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made and Too Small for Any Decent Size Food Prep Containers
customer_reviews.text: Really hoped this product would be what I was looking for, but it's very poorly made, with zippers that barely close or stay together. Aside from that, the two compartments are too small or oddly shaped to fit a typical, standard food prep containers. The pictures showing full size meal prep containers are deceptive, there's no way those actually fit in the bag based on its dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: RSL

customer_reviews.title: Small and weak
customer_reviews.text: Liked: -The double compartments -has good insulation Hated: -Compartment size is Annoyingly small, especially! with the hot or cold packs -Mediocre stitching and seems, falling apart -
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: WAY TO BIG FOR EVERYDAY REGULAR LUNCH USEAGE
customer_reviews.text: Not what I had hoped for. This is an ENORMOUS lunch bag. Way too big for walking long distances. It is heavy straight out of the box, cant imagine what it would weigh with food in it. Was very disappointed to see the bulkiness of this product. Great idea, but need same thing in smaller version. I am a commuter student I carry a backpack, a trapper keeper and a lunch bag. Campus is huge! So long territory to walk and this is too big.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Banger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I love thee Suricata bag. I found the quality to be good and love the heating and cooling compartments. I highly recommend this bag. Great to take to the beach or to a sporting event.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality or effectiveness I was hoping for, for $40.
customer_reviews.author: KBZ
